description: Protecting applications through authentication, authorization, cryptography, and secure coding practices. `System.Security.Cryptography` provides hashing (`SHA256`, `SHA512`), symmetric encryption (`AES`), asymmetric encryption (`RSA`), and digital signatures. Use role-based security for authorization and follow secure coding guidelines to prevent vulnerabilities.
shortDescription: Cryptography, authentication, authorization, and secure coding practices.
preamble: **.NET 10 adds:** Post-quantum cryptography support with `MLKem`, `MLDsa`, and `SlhDsa` classes (FIPS 203/204/205), AES KeyWrap with Padding (`EncryptKeyWrapPadded`/`DecryptKeyWrapPadded`), and `X509Certificate2Collection.FindByThumbprint` for SHA-256/SHA-3 thumbprints.
